chapter.title: Connect to the Internet
chapter.para: This section shows you how to connect to the Internet and home networks. You will also find troubleshooting guides within the sections.
Lastly, this section also provides a guide to Internet applications.

important.para: Network Manager is used in many sections of this guide - you can find it:

listitem.para: In the Notification Area. Its icon resembles two computer screens on top of each other, or a wireless signal indicator if you are connected to a wireless network.
